name: lytedev-site
description: My personal blog, portfolio, and website at https://lyte.dev

scripts.build-styles: mkdir -p static/styles && yarn run stylus --use ./node_modules/poststylus --with "['autoprefixer']" --compress src/styles/site.styl --out static/styles/site.css
scripts.build: yarn run build-styles & yarn run build-scripts & yarn run build-logo
scripts.watch-styles: yarn run nodemon -e styl -x "yarn run build-styles"
scripts.watch-scripts: yarn run nodemon -e coffee -x "yarn run build-scripts"
scripts.watch-logo: yarn run nodemon -e coffee,pug --watch ./src/logo/ -x "yarn run build-logo"
scripts.watch: yarn run watch-styles & yarn run watch-scripts & yarn run watch-logo
scripts.build-all: yarn run build-theme && yarn run build && yarn run hugo-build
scripts.watch-all: yarn run watch-theme & yarn run watch & yarn run hugo
scripts.watch-all-lan: yarn run watch-theme & yarn run watch & yarn run hugo-lan

author: daniel@lyte.dev
